text: (He it is Who hath sent His messenger) Muhammad (pbuh) (with the guidance) with the message of Allah's divine Oneness; and it is also said this means: with the Qur'an (and the religion of truth) the testification that there is no deity except Allah, (that He may make it conqueror of all religion) such that the Hour will not come except that people are either among the Muslims or among those who pay the capitation tax to the Muslims (however much idolaters may be averse) even though the Jews, Christians and Pagan Arabs dislike its happening.
